oneOf.description: A unit of count defining the number of items regarded as separate units.

oneOf.title: Dozens
oneOf.description: A unit of count defining the number of units in multiples of 12.

oneOf.description: A unit of count defining the number of assortments (assortment: a collection of items or components of a single product packaged together).

oneOf.title: Service Units
oneOf.description: A unit of count defining the number of service units (service unit: defined period / property / facility / utility of supply).

oneOf.title: Jobs
oneOf.description: A unit of count defining the number of jobs.

oneOf.description: A unit of count defining the number of activities (activity: a unit of work or action).

oneOf.title: Trips
oneOf.description: A unit of count defining the number of trips (trip: a journey to a place and back again).

oneOf.title: Groups
oneOf.description: A unit of count defining the number of groups (group: set of items classified together).
